|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = V5.5 |cpu1spd = 580 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85712-21;SKY21, 85712, 516VA;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.50.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS,ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,,^ASUS_5G$ |default_ch = |manuf = SGE |manuf_model = AP-MTOE |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, Padavan |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/29/2015 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B01ATNHG36 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612EN; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :"AP-MTOE-3DC6 REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board. *FCC ID: [https://fcc.io/MSQ/-RT1D00 MSQ-RT1D00] ('''ASUS RT-AC1200''' / [[ASUS RT-N600]]) :''All models are electrically identical, different model names are for marketing purpose.'' {{FCC ST|11/25/2015}} ===Specifications=== *Super-fast concurrent dual-band 802.11ac Wi-Fi at up to 1167 Mbps *Improved coverage and multi-device performance with four external :5dBi antennas - two each for the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands *USB 2.0 port supports AiPlayer for music streaming *Help your children stay safe online with Parental Control ==Links of Interest== [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1200/specifications/ Specifications] {{•}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1200/gallery/ Gallery] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/new-asus-rt-ac1200hp-rt-ac56s-rt-n56u-v2-wireless-router.22328/ ''ASUS RT-AC1200'' on '''SNB''' forums] (RTN) *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62648-89#3317 ''ASUS RT-AC1200'' on '''iXBT''' forums] (Padavan) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628AN @580MHz WiSoC (2T2R 802.11bgn) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7612EN (2T2R 802.11an+ac) :RAM: 64MB (DDR2), Flash 16MB (SPI, 16-pin), USB 2.0 *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-30747-1-1.html ''ASUS RT-AC1200'' on '''KoolShare''' forums] (images PCB) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628AN @580MHz (WiSoC) :Flash: ''Spansion'' S25FL128SAIF00 16MB (SPI) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5TU32M16EG-AC 64MB (DDR2) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7628AN (2.4GHz) + MT7612EN (5GHz) :2.4GHz PAM: 2x [[Skyworks]] SKY77627-11 ?? (•• 7627 15G15) :5GHz FEM: 2x [[Skyworks]] SKY85712-21 (SKY21 85712 516VA) *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1283-asus-rt-ac1200g/ ''ASUS RT-AC1200G+'' on '''Openitforum''' forums] (house) *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=287041 ''ASUS RT-AC1200'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] (cpuinfo) ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Firmware=== Powerful with [[List of Padavan firmware supported devices|Padavan]] Firmware, Entware/Optware:enabled USB storage allows full Linux operation. ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-ac1200 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/rt-ac1200 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt76x8 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 22.03.0 |current_supported_version = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ===Padavan repos:=== *https://bitbucket.org/padavan/rt-n56u/ *https://github.com/andy-padavan/rt-n56u/
===Padavan follow-ups:=== *https://github.com/russinnes/RT-N600-Padavan *https://github.com/StarWhiz/Asus-RT-AC1200-Padavan *https://gitlab.com/dm38/padavan-ng
{{SCollapse|[https://bitbucket.org/padavan/rt-n56u/src/master/trunk/configs/boards/RT-AC1200/ ASUS RT-AC1200 board profiles] • >> |
trunk/configs/boards/RT-AC1200/board.h

/* ASUS RT-AC1200 */

#define BOARD_PID		"RT-AC1200"
#define BOARD_NAME		"RT-AC1200"
#define BOARD_DESC		"ASUS RT-AC1200 Wireless Router"
#define BOARD_VENDOR_NAME	"ASUSTek Computer Inc."
#define BOARD_VENDOR_URL	"http://www.asus.com/"
#define BOARD_MODEL_URL		"http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1200/"
#define BOARD_BOOT_TIME		25
#define BOARD_FLASH_TIME	120
#define BOARD_GPIO_BTN_RESET	5
#define BOARD_GPIO_BTN_WPS	11
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_ALL	4
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_WIFI
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_POWER	37
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_LAN
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_WAN
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_USB	6
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_ROUTER
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_PWR_USB
#define BOARD_HAS_5G_11AC	1
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_5G_TX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_5G_RX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_2G_TX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_2G_RX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ETH_LEDS	1
#define BOARD_HAS_EPHY_L1000	0
#define BOARD_HAS_EPHY_W1000	0

trunk/configs/boards/RT-AC1200/board.mk

##################################################################
# Board PID   # Board Name        # PRODUCT # Note
##################################################################
# RT-AC1200   # ASUS RT-AC1200    # MT7628  #
##################################################################

CFLAGS += -DBOARD_AC1200 -DVENDOR_ASUS
BOARD_NUM_USB_PORTS=1
}} ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ;cpuinfo 
admin@RT-AC1200:/tmp/home/root# cat /proc/cpuinfo

system type             : MT7628 
processor               : 0 
cpu model               : MIPS 24Kc V5.5 
BogoMIPS                : 386.04 
wait instruction        : yes 
microsecond timers      : yes 
tlb_entries             : 32 
extra interrupt vector  : yes 
hardware watchpoint     : yes, count: 4, address/irw mask: 
                          [0x0000, 0x0d88, 0x08b0, 0x0198] 
ASEs implemented        : mips16 dsp 
shadow register sets    : 1 
core                    : 0 
VCED exceptions         : not available 
VCEI exceptions         : not available
